price: Àdánwò tó ń yí n̄ǹkan po láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ sì yí ọgbà náà po, nígbà tí wọ́n sùn lọ.
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
